meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by myoclonus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the myoclonic movements were caused by a neurological condition.
meanings.sent2: Her myoclonic seizures were triggered by stress.
meanings.sent3: The myoclonic dance moves of the robot made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The myoclonic jerks of the old car engine reminded me of a hiccup.
meanings.sent5: The myoclonic nature of the flickering lights created a spooky atmosphere in the room.

meanings.sent1: The myoclonic twitch in his arm startled him.
meanings.sent2: She experienced myoclonic spasms during her sleep.
meanings.sent3: The myoclonic jump of the frog was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The myoclonic movements of the branches in the wind resembled a dance.
meanings.sent5: The myoclonic contraction in her leg was painful but brief.
